app.title: Optimal Resume
app.tagline: Optimize, analyze gaps, and format beautifully

upload.title: Step 1: Upload Your Information
upload.subtitle: Provide your resume and the job description
upload.dragDrop: Click to upload PDF, Word, or Text file
upload.extractingMessage: Please wait while we extract your resume...
upload.extractingTime: This usually takes 5-10 seconds for PDFs
upload.jobPlaceholder: Paste the full job description here...

export.tip: üí° **Tip:** Use "Print / PDF" and choose "Save as PDF" in the print dialog.

addSkill.title: Add Missing Skill to Resume
addSkill.selectExperience: Select which experience to add this to:
addSkill.editNote: You can edit this before adding

success.title: Payment Successful!
success.message: Your account has been upgraded. You can now use your additional resume optimizations.
success.processingMessage: Please wait while we confirm your purchase.

canceled.title: Payment Canceled
canceled.message: Your payment was canceled. No charges have been made to your account.

footer.title: Resume Optimizer
footer.description: AI-powered resume optimization platform by Control BIA LLC. Transform your resume with intelligent suggestions and professional templates.
footer.disclaimer: Resume Optimizer provides AI-generated suggestions. Review all content before use. We do not guarantee employment outcomes. See Terms of Service for details.

cookies.title: We use cookies
cookies.description: We use essential cookies for authentication and optional cookies to improve your experience. You can customize your preferences or accept all. See our Privacy Policy for details.

essential.title: Essential Cookies (Required)
essential.description: Required for authentication, security, and core functionality. Cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies (Optional)
analytics.description: Help us understand how you use the app to improve performance and user experience.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies (Optional)
preferences.description: Remember your settings and preferences for a personalized experience.
